TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceGroupFactory extends System.Object

summary.para: Creates a service group factory that is used to create actual service groups from the provided type factories at runtime.

public void AddServiceType (string serviceTypeName, Type serviceTypeImplementation);

Public Sub AddServiceType (serviceTypeName As String, serviceTypeImplementation As Type)

param.name: serviceTypeName
param.para: The service type name as a string. It should match the service type that is specified in the manifest or the of the that is provided during the call.

param.name: serviceTypeImplementation
param.para: The fully qualified C# type of the service that implements the Service Fabric service.

summary.para: Registers a particular stateful or stateless service type with the service group factory so that it can be created as a member of the service group.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddStatefulServiceFactory (string serviceTypeName, System.Fabric.IStatefulServiceFactory factory);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddStatefulServiceFactory(string serviceTypeName, class System.Fabric.IStatefulServiceFactory factory) cil managed
Public Sub AddStatefulServiceFactory (serviceTypeName As String, factory As IStatefulServiceFactory)

param.name: serviceTypeName
param.para: Indicates the service type name as a string. It should match the service type that is specified in the manifest or the of the that is provided during the call.

param.name: factory
param.para: The stateful service factory to add.

summary.para: Adds the specified stateful service factory to the service group factory.

param.para: The service type name as a string. It should match the service type that was specified when the factory was registered.
